    StepSize.wRef

    StepSize.wRef.Rd

    StepSize.wRef

    StepSize.wRef(
  Bseries = NULL,
  Rseries = NULL,
  InCs,
  output,
  MissingValueCode = "-999.99",
  plev = 0.95,
  Iadj = 10000,
  Mq = 10,
  GUI = F,
  Ny4a = 0,
  is_plot = TRUE
)

    Examples

    ## example 02 ------------------------------------------------------------------
Bseries <- system.file("extdata/Example2.dat", package = "RHtests")
Rseries <- system.file("extdata/Example2_Ref.dat", package = "RHtests")

metadata <- data.table(date = c("19740200", "19751100"))

r <- RHtests_process(Bseries, Rseries, metadata, output = "OUTPUT/example02")
#> Error in RHtests_process(Bseries, Rseries, metadata, output = "OUTPUT/example02"): unused argument (output = "OUTPUT/example02")
plot_RHtests(r, "RHtests-ref.pdf")
#> Error in is.data.table(data): object 'r' not found

# expect_equal(nrow(r$turningPoint), 11)
# expect_equal(as.character(r$turningPoint[kind == 0]$date),
#               metadata$date)
# expect_equal(nrow(r$data), 612)
